comment.body: @nofishï¼ŒHow to select files which only have a small number of peers to help distribute ,Instead of the popular files which have a large number of peers OR only can help distribute  all files of a site ?  Could make it easy to select?

> [nofish](#comment_131_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): You can sort by peer number, then you can delete the most seeded ones

It is  very boring to delete one by one.

> [nofish](#comment_132_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): You dont have to it will be deleted automatically if the limit is reached

I  want to seed the the unpopular files.My storage is enough.

> [nofish](#comment_133_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): "Help distribute all new files" is the best way to do that, since the new ones are the less seeded ones.

Thanks.
